mapper.sql: id, supplierNum, supplier, address, category, link_man, phone, weixin, qq, license, certificate, credit, deadLine, information, bank, supply_category, bank_num, maker, create_date, remarks, del_flag

mapper.insert:

FROM account_supplier a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.`del_flag` = 0
